thread.title: Galaxy S7 and S7 edge Nougat firmware for Turkey now available for download
thread.title_full: Galaxy S7 and S7 edge Nougat firmware for Turkey now available for download

author: Asif S.
title: Galaxy S7 and S7 edge Nougat firmware for Turkey now available for download
text:
Asif S. / 56 mins ago 
Samsung started the rollout of Android 7.0 update to the Galaxy S7 and S7 edge in a few countries last month, including China, France, India, Malaysia, South Korea, Turkey, the UAE, and the UK. Now, Galaxy S7 and S7 edge Nougat firmware files are available for download from our firmware database. 
The firmware for the Galaxy S7 ( SM-G930F ) carries version number G930FXXU1DQB7, while the one for the Galaxy S7 edge ( SM-G935F ) carries version number G935FXXU1DQB7. After the update, both devices would be updated with the February 2017 security patch. You can download full firmware files from our firmware section by hitting the appropriate source link below. 
Nougat brings a lot of new features and some visual flair to the Galaxy S7 and S7 edge. You can check out this video for a walkthrough of all the notable changes and new features that come with the Nougat update. 
Firmware Details
